name: Geany CP IDE with C/C++ Compiler
short_description:
Geany IDE is one of the most popular IDE used by students,as well as professionals..

But Geany doesn't boast of an inbuilt c or cplusplus compiler support hence we need to use external compiler :( but with this Geany CP IDE , there's no need of any external compiler whatsoever! everything comes inbuilt , you just have to install and then directly code into Geany!

No need of changing Environment Variables,build commands etc! Just install and Play!

Windows 7 And Windows 8 Users should "Run it as Administrator" to avoid Errors! :)
summary: Geany IDE with inbuilt c and cpp compiler support! inbuilt gcc and g++
